title: The Rock
writer: David Weisberg, Douglas Cook, Mark Rosner
actors: Sean Connery, Nicolas Cage, Ed Harris
plot: An FBI chemical weapons expert, and a former SAS soldier turned political prisoner, must break into Alcatraz prison when a rogue military group, led by a renegade general, take it over and threaten a nerve gas attack on San Franci...
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 9 wins & 10 nominations total
